body:
So here's what I understand. 
Story: So at the first pages we see MC following a girl, MC didn't pay attention to his surroundings and got hit by a car, then he turned into a ghost/wondering soul, then he started ogling women without them knowing, later a woman saw MC peeping on her Pantsu, MC realized she can see him, then they talk, MC thinks that by fulfilling his desire(that is Sex), could bring him to the afterlife, then they have SEX, MC fulfilled his wish, after that we see MC in a Hospital Bed, still alive. 
Summary: MC Turned to ghost by getting hit by a Car, he then Ogled on Women and then found out that the last one can see him, they talked and then had sex, MC now thinks he's ascending to heaven but instead, we see that he's in the Hospital.
Conclusion: A possible part 2 where they actually meet and date then sex. And also translate this so I can understand what's really happening
Either he died from fulfilling his regrets, or he pulled what they did in the movie 'the invisible' and got back to his body
Sad boy hours. He was able to finally pass on

But i really really want to do it a lot." Implying probably that he don't want to die yet.
